short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track character, plot, setting and submissions via this simple Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Writer's Notebook is a convenient, easy to use tool for writers to capture information about their stories.  Keep your notes close at hand with this Chrome extension.

With Chrome Sync all of your notes move from browser to browser when you have sync turned on.  Have your notes available regardless of the machine you are using.
